author: Hikaru Ch.- 黒画ね光る
text:
ルシアさん、あなたを怒らせて悲しくさせようとする愚かな人がたくさんいることを知っています。チャットでそれらのコメントを見ることができず、ただ無視します。
あなたは素晴らしく、多くの人に幸せをもたらし、素晴らしい人です。
海外のファンは有毒だと思いますが、私も海外です。あなたに対するそのような無礼は私を緊張させました。
それらを無視してください。 それは難しい ？ あなたの気持ちはわかりませんが、私にとってあなたは重要です。 私だけでなくたくさんの人がいるので、笑顔でバカを無視してストリーミングを続けてください、あなたは私たちの愛するツンデレボーイングボーイングです♡
私が住んでいるブラジルから乾杯、あなたの才能が南アメリカにも届いたのを見て。

P.S.
I do speak Japanese but not much well so i had to use the translator.

author: Jun wei Zhu
text: @Griffion Wyvrus  False alarm,  clip is already removed and the translator had already posted an apology for the bad and out-of-context translation after being called out by several other translators for painting a situation that never existed.

author: Mike Bather
text: @Jun wei Zhu  Then what really happened then

author: Jun wei Zhu
text:
@Mike Bather  viewers  asked Rushia whether she'll be okay with the time(5-10mins before holoEN debut) and reminded her that the debut of holoEN was about to begin and when she asked about the superchats, they responded that it may be better to do it next time. They did so out of concern because Rushia had frequently overlapped important streams(think birthday streams etc) before.
Rushia readily said okay actually, but since many other viewers were also telling her it was fine to continue, she started to hesitate. She decided to ask her manager again. Her manager didn't respond though, probably because it was around 8pm or just busy.
Rushia mentioned while waiting that she already asked before because it bothered her and got the okay already. She then decided to continue  for about 15 mins and couldn't handle the stress anymore and decided to stop after all. The viewers were pretty well behaved and understanding during the entire 15 mins.
If you've seen the clip before, you'll start to notice the translator removed a lot of parts that made context to what Rushia said there.

text:
How many time passed from that memorable "Minecraft on Tanabata", and the same BGM at starting.

The underground quest was so exhaustive, Rushia-hime excavated until arriving to other homes.

Also... Mission Completed about the 50 Diamonds... well, Rushia-hime collected 10 more. Additionally, Aqua-san was Online and Rushia gave the 10 remaining diamonds.

author: むはにたあ
text:
お疲れ様でした。
予想の半分以下の時間で50個達成して驚いた。



堀り返すべきじゃないかと思ってたんですが、少しその話が出たので新参ながら申し上げます。

昨日の件で心配していたんですがこの配信見て安心しました。
Twitterやってないから自身の考えを言う機会があまりありませんが、皆様と同じくこれからもサポートしていく所存です。
スパチャがメインになると思いますが、スパチャやメンバー加入だけがサポートじゃないし皆で楽しくやっていきましょう。
